title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, the application emits a bell sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the bell sound.
EB: I expect that selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText should not produce any sound. It should function as intended without emitting a bell sound when other buttons are clicked.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Launch the application.
2. Access the ControlExampleText.
3. Select the option for SWT.MULTI.
4. Click on various buttons in the application.
